%pyspark

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import random
import copy
import sys

%pyspark

game = Caro(10, 10, 5)
game.action([(2, 3), (4, 4), (2, 4), (4, 6), (2, 5), (1, 4), (2, 6), (7, 7), (2, 7)])
game.show()
print(game.get_state())
print(game.is_terminal())

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

line_len = 3
game = Caro(3, 3, line_len)
win_msg = None

%pyspark

x = z.input('Nhập tọa độ x (cột)')
y = z.input('Nhập tọa độ y (hàng)')

if not win_msg:
    human_action = (int(x), int(y))
    game.action([human_action])
    ai_action = solve(game)
    game.action([ai_action])
    
    if is_win_line(game.get_state(), human_action, line_len):
        win_msg = 'human win!'
    elif is_win_line(game.get_state(), ai_action, line_len):
        win_msg = 'AI win!'
    elif game.is_terminal():
        win_msg = 'It\'s a draw!'

if win_msg:
    print(win_msg)

game.show_imgs((15, 15))
